column4: When I'm about to activate the network driver (for a broadcom card) in the Restricted Drivers manager, I'm asked to provide a location for some firmware. What is that firmware. Is it the Windows Vista driver files or is it the driver (an .exe) that I can download from Compaq's site, or is it something that is located in Ubuntu?
It gives you the link to download it from
And if you have another means of connecting to the internet it can download it for you
